Number of electrified households (urban)5/1/2020 12:00:00 AMMHEM / REGIDESOWAKANA FerdinandMHEM statistics and planning departmentSDG focal point at MHEM(+257) 799772981156 BUJUMBURAwakanafer@yahoo.frThis is the number of urban households subscribing to REGIDESONumberREGIDESO, annual report 2016Centralized database operation, collection is done dailyThe probable date of the next collection will be 2020In 2021MHEN / REGIDESOISTEEBU is responsible for compiling this indicator at the national levelISTEEBU is the body recognized by the Burundian government for the collection, processing and dissemination of official statistics helping in planning and decision-making.The indicator is relevant because it reflects the level of electricity coverageThe numerator may not be exhaustive because some households supplied with electricity are not registered with REGIDESO. The indicator cannot be calculated by gender.This indicator is given by the sum of households subscribing to REGIDESOThe survey results data are validated at two levels: technical validation and official validation before publication.The indicator is available at national levelThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international levelREGIDESO report
